title: 113: Bachelor Recap: Episode 3 (Pilot Pete & Miss Texas Intentions)
itunes:title: 113: Bachelor Recap: Episode 3 (Pilot Pete & Miss Texas Intentions)
description:
The Broads discuss the continued drama between the ladies. They chat about the remaining bubbles of #champagnegate, differing opinions on Victoria P (and her wine preferences), Demi’s feathery return, feeling bad for Alayah (hear us out), theories we are currently forming, and much more! 
Follow us at @chattybroads on Instagram and check out out Youtube Channel!
